author: Mollie Russell
description:
Dungeons and Dragons has been busy playtesting new character options in recent months, and several of them share something in common. They really, really love teleportation. Since D&D’s 2024 overhaul, it seems like teleporting subclasses have become a core part of Wizards of the Coast’s design MO, and more of the class options crop up all the time.

Continue reading DnD has way too many teleporting subclasses, but which is best?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD has way too many teleporting subclasses, but which is best?

author: Chloe Ward
description:
It’s August, and you know what that means? Several new Star Wars Lego sets have hit the stores, ready for us Lego fanatics to drool over… and probably purchase. Here's my rundown of the three you need to know about.

Continue reading Don't miss these three new Star Wars Lego Sets landing in August 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star Wars LEGO sets
title: Don't miss these three new Star Wars Lego Sets landing in August 2025

author: Callum Self
description:
Much like every other recent expansion, Pokémon White Flare (and Black Bolt, too) are hard to get your hands on. Sold out at every retailer or going for sky-high scalping prices, it’s about as hard to get as a real life pet Reshiram. But it appears the Pokégods have blessed us, because you can grab a Japanese booster box of White Flare at $52 off, and in all honesty, that’s a better deal than getting English products.

Continue reading Get $52 off Japanese Pokémon White Flare booster boxes right now
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Get $52 off Japanese Pokémon White Flare booster boxes right now

author: Mollie Russell
description:
From the sprawling Batcave to the speedy Batmobile, there’s a huge range of Batman Lego sets to choose from. The greatest locations, vehicles, and characters from the DC superhero series can all be found in brick form – and with so much iconic imagery to choose from, it might take you some time to find the right Lego Batman set.

Luckily, someone shone a signal in the sky, and we’ve swooped in to help you find the best Lego sets that feature the Dark Knight. Below you’ll find a range of excellent sets, from the biggest Lego sets and most expensive Lego sets for serious collectors to the best cheap Lego sets for those who love to build and play.

Continue reading
title: Best Batman Lego sets

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering creature card Zask, Skittering Swarmlord has grown in value, going from $6 this time last month to a whopping $43. It’s all thanks to the Eumidians, alien insects from Edge of Eternities that - just like Zask - also have land-based synergies.

Continue reading MTG card sees 600% price spike triggered by Edge of Eternities' alien bugs
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: MTG card sees 600% price spike triggered by Edge of Eternities' alien bugs

author: Alex Evans
description:
During my hot-foot rush through Gen Con 2025 (meeting as many cool publishers as possible to keep Wargamer stocked with news and reviews over the next year) I had a real treat: an hour and a half long interview with Dominic McDowall, CEO of Cubicle 7, to pick his brains on the studio's newest RPG hotness. There's a lot to share (including exclusive details on the new Horus Heresy TTRPG) but first, here's his download on the state of the Warhammer: The Old World tabletop RPG.

Continue reading CEO tells us what's next for Warhammer The Old World tabletop RPG
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer: The Old World latest news, Warhammer The Old World rules,
title: CEO tells us what's next for Warhammer The Old World tabletop RPG
